question: Which aircraft model has the best on-time arrival performance?
query:
SELECT a.model,
       AVG(EXTRACT(EPOCH FROM (f.actual_arrival - f.scheduled_arrival)))/60 AS avg_delay_minutes
FROM postgres_air.flight f
JOIN postgres_air.aircraft a ON f.aircraft_code = a.code
WHERE f.actual_arrival IS NOT NULL
GROUP BY a.model
ORDER BY avg_delay_minutes ASC
LIMIT 1;
